Address.Address1: Karang Mas Estate, Jl Karang Mas Sejahtera, Jimbaran

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at RIMBA Jimbaran Bali in Jimbaran, you'll be convenient to Balangan Beach and New Kuta Golf. This 5-star resort is within close proximity of New Kuta Beach and Jenggala Factory.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 282 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Premium TV channels and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and rainfall showerheads.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy body treatments. After dipping into one of the 6 outdoor swimming pools, you can spend some time at the private beach. This resort also features complimentary wireless Internet access, supervised childcare/activities, and babysitting/childcare. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the complimentary area shuttle.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the resort's dining establishments, which include 15 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-out, and a 24-hour front desk. Free parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 15:00:00 Check-out time is 12:00:00

Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Balangan Beach - 2 km / 1.2 mi
New Kuta Golf - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
New Kuta Beach - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Jenggala Factory - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Bingin Beach - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Garuda Wisnu Kencana Cultural Park - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
Honorary Consulate of Italy - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
Benoa Square - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi

Lippo Mall - 6.3 km / 3.9 mi
Suluban Beach - 6.5 km / 4 mi
Tuban Beach - 6.5 km / 4 mi
Discovery Shopping Mall - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi

The preferred airport for RIMBA Jimbaran Bali is Denpasar (DPS-Ngurah Rai Intl.) - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
